ai-thag2.30:1.1_0: I regularly sat close by good people
ai-thag2.30:1.4_0: the direct route that culminates in the deathless.
ai-thag2.30:2.1_0: I’ve slain the desire to be reborn,
ai-thag2.30:2.2_0: it won’t be found in me again.
ai-thag2.30:2.3_0: It was not, and it won’t be in me,
ai-thag2.30:2.4_0: and it isn’t found in me now.
ai-thag2.30:2.7_0: The third sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
ai-thag2.30:3.1_0: The Elder Uttara, who was the supreme Elder Bhaddā’s Man
ai-thag2.30:3.2_0: the hermits has been objected by the hermit,
ai-thag2.30:3.3_0: The senior monk who is free of delusion,
ai-thag2.30:3.6_0: By the dark one, great intelligent,
